laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile toxin A & B test
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).

No focal or textural hepatic abnormalities identified. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Gallbladder moderately distended with a small amount of sludge. No wall thickening or cholelithiasis. Small amount of pericholecystic fluid observed. Common bile duct measures approximately 3-4 mm. Right kidney measures 11.5 cm with no hydronephrosis, stone, or renal mass identified.
